outline:
Ashtaroth or Astaroth = "star"
  1. false goddesses in the Canaanite religion, usually related to fertility cult
  2. a city in Bashan east of the Jordan given to Manasseh
    1. same as 06255
kjv_def: Asharoth, Astaroth. See also H1045 (בֵּית עַשְׁתָּרוֹת), H6253 (עַשְׁתֹּרֶת), H6255 (עַשְׁתְּרֹת קַרְנַיִם).
strongs_def: Ashtaroth, the name of a Sidonian deity, and of a place East of the Jordan
